thread.title: UDM receives Fulbright-Hays Group Project Abroad to Brazil (University of Detroit Mercy)
thread.title_full: UDM receives Fulbright-Hays Group Project Abroad to Brazil (University of Detroit Mercy) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: UDM receives Fulbright-Hays Group Project Abroad to Brazil (University of Detroit Mercy)
text: ( Source : University of Detroit Mercy ) University of Detroit Mercy has been awarded a U.S. Department of Education Fulbright-Hays Group Project Abroad ( GPA ) to Brazil from Aug. 3, 2015 through Jan. 3, 2017. The program is open to up to four
